product_name: Nite Ize Inova STS 142-Lumen Helmet Light
long_description: This waterproof, multi-mode, white and red helmet light mounts to almost any helmet and features a simple touch-activated interface, making it easy to get the lighting you want for any type of ride.
short_description: This waterproof, multi-mode, white and red helmet light mounts to almost any helmet and features a simple touch-activated interface, making it easy to get the lighting you want for any type of ride.
